title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should either be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Check the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.

Expected result:
Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should either be available or neither should be enabled.
